name: cavegame
description:
cavegame - a world to explore, adventure awaits!

This game is still rather early in development, and I'm honestly just making it up as I go along. So far it's turned out pretty well, and I thought it would be cool to share it. I'll be uploading new builds probably once a week, maybe more.

How to Play:

  • A & D - move left and right
  • S & W - climb rope, descend platforms
  • Left Click & Right Click - use items
  • Escape - Open inventory
  • Tab - open console (type 'help' for a list of commands)

Completed Features:

  • Infinite*, procedural world
  • Player interaction, digging, placing
  • Inventory, crafting system
  • Tile lighting, tiles are not always static, they can change over time.
  • Liquids

What's To Come:

  • An actual game menu
  • World saving and loading
  • Enemies (maybe even bosses)
  • More toys to play with
  • Combat system
  • Potions
  • More cool stuff generated in the world

My mother is sick, so I stay at home to take care of her. This leaves me with enough free time to work on this project full-time, more or less.

If you like what I'm doing, consider throwing me a dollar to help feed my nicotine addiction.

If you want to contribute or playtest hit me up on my discord: joshuu#6360

* The world will generate forever, but rounding errors cause the game to become completely unplayable at ~2.1 billion tiles away from the spawnpoint.
